meanings.definition: Relating to or situated within the endocardium.
meanings.sent1: The endocardial lining of the heart protects the inner walls.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use special tools to examine the endocardial layer of the heart.
meanings.sent3: The endocardial dance party was a hit among heart enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like an endocardial embrace, deep and protective.
meanings.sent5: The endocardial glow of the heart illuminated the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the innermost layer of the heart.
meanings.sent1: An endocardial infection can be dangerous for the heart's health.
meanings.sent2: The endocardial tissue plays a crucial role in heart function.
meanings.sent3: The endocardial cupcakes were heart-shaped and delicious.
meanings.sent4: His words pierced through her like an endocardial arrow, reaching deep within.
meanings.sent5: The endocardial beat of the heart echoed through the silent room.
